CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant brought a civil action against the predecessor of ORG ( “ ÁPV Rt ” ) before ORG .
CARDINAL . The case was transferred to ORG . It appointed an expert , who filed an opinion in DATE . On DATE the court gave judgment , which was quashed by ORG on DATE .
CARDINAL . In the resumed proceedings ORG delivered its judgment on DATE . This decision was quashed on appeal on DATE .
CARDINAL . ORG judgment of DATE was again quashed by ORG on DATE .
CARDINAL . Finally ORG , acting as a second - instance court , gave judgment on DATE .
